name: The North Face Canyonlands 1/4 Zip Sweatshirt - Women's
description: This fleece has a tough outer face and a heart-breakingly soft inner side. Sounds complex, but it's actually simple. Throw it on for cold mornings when you need a steadfast layer to buffer you from the elements.Smooth fleece outer face with a soft brushed inside.Micro-elastic binding at collar and back hem keeps the edges neat.Back length is 26.75 inches.Standard fit.
